docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Advanced moderation
  • Fun commands
  • Leveling system
  • Social notifications
  • Firecoin economy
  • Various utilities

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: Refer to the guide

docs.title: Support
docs.text: Join support server

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
Self-hosting an instance of Scripty is unrecommended. Please invite our hosted version instead.

Note

There is an exception to this statement explained below.

docs.title: Contributing
docs.text:
Please check the GitHub repository for guidelines.

While we do not support self-hosting, we do encourage contributions so that we can improve Scripty. Thus, setting up the bot simply involves modiying the config.toml file with the respective values, and then adding an _ prefix to the file name. After installing the Python requirements, run python -m scripty in the root directory in order to start the bot.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
Info

Required parameters are surrounded by []. Optional arguments are wrapped using ().

Danger

Do not literally type out [] or ()!

Tip

Parameters in a correctly formed command might look similar to /command [[option] value] in the user interface.

docs.title: activity
docs.text:
Slash Command

Start a Discord Activity

Parameters [activity] Activity to start 

ACTIVITIES = {
    "Poker Night": "755827207812677713",
    "Chess In The Park": "832012774040141894",
    "Letter League": "879863686565621790",
    "SpellCast": "852509694341283871",
    "Watch Together": "880218394199220334",
    "Checkers In The Park": "832013003968348200",
    "Word Snacks": "879863976006127627",
    "Blazing 8s": "832025144389533716",
    "Sketch Heads": "902271654783242291",
    "Land-io": "903769130790969345",
    "Betrayal.io": "773336526917861400",
    "Fishington.io": "814288819477020702",
    "Putt Party": "945737671223947305",
}

[channel] Channel for activity

Note

The [activity] option returns an autocomplete interaction interface. From the panel pop up, you can select and search the Activity to start or enter a valid Discord Activity Application ID. By default, only 10 activity choices are shown at once! Please type to search for the activity if it does not appear by default.

Slash Command

Create a simple poll

Parameters [topic] Topic of the poll [option_a] Option A [option_b] Option B (option_c) Option C (option_d) Option D (option_e) Option E (option_f) Option F (option_g) Option G (option_h) Option H (option_i) Option I (option_j) Option J

docs.title: unban
docs.text:
Slash Command

Unban user from server

Parameters [user] User to unban

Note

The [user] option returns an autocomplete interaction interface. You can select the user you want to unban or search by username as well as ID.
